About_me: I would like to introduce myself as an Energy Management Professional with 12+ years of experience in Technical services, Energy Management Systems, Energy Auditing, Clean Development Mechanism (CDM), Green House Gas (GHG) Accounting, Clean Energy Development, Energy Trading and Environment Activities in Captive power plants, Petrochemical and Refinery units. I am a Certified Energy Auditor (Bureau of Energy Efficiency, Ministry of Power, Govt. Of India) and have completed B.E. in Chemical Engineering from Marathawada University, Maharashtra, India and MBA in Operations Management from Chennai University, India.  Before joining Shell, I worked as Technologist - Energy, CPP & Utilities with HPCL Mittal Energy Limited - HMEL for approximately 3 years in Guru Gobind Singh Refinery, Bathinda, India. Prior to joining HMEL, I worked with Indian Oil & Gas Major - Reliance Industries Limited at their Head Office in Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India as Manager - CDM & Energy Management for a period of approximately 5 years.   My key interest areas include Energy Management Systems development, Heat Integration studies, Cogeneration Systems evaluation, Energy Benchmarking, Carbon and Sustainability Management, Energy Costing, Development of Energy Performance Improvement Projects on Supply & Demand Models.  I am married to Priyanka, she is MBA (Finance & HR) and working as Banking professional. I enjoy playing with my daughter Saanvi, driving my car, listening music, visiting new places and spending time with my family.
